title: High Insider Ownership Growth Companies In Global August 2025
description: As global markets navigate a challenging landscape marked by trade policy uncertainties and slowing job growth, investors are keenly observing the impact on stock indexes, with smaller-cap indexes experiencing notable declines. Amidst this backdrop, companies with high insider ownership can offer appealing prospects due to their potential alignment of management interests with those of shareholders.
content:
As global markets navigate a challenging landscape marked by trade policy uncertainties and slowing job growth, investors are keenly observing the impact on stock indexes, with smaller-cap indexes experiencing notable declines. Amidst this backdrop, companies with high insider ownership can offer appealing prospects due to their potential alignment of management interests with those of shareholders. Click here to see the full list of 808 stocks from our Fast Growing Global Companies With High Insider Ownership screener. Here we highlight a subset of our preferred stocks from the screener. Overview: ALTEOGEN Inc. is a biotechnology company specializing in the development of long-acting biobetters, proprietary antibody-drug conjugates, and antibody biosimilars, with a market cap of ₩23.09 trillion. Operations: The company's revenue primarily comes from its biotechnology segment, amounting to ₩151.65 million. Alteogen's revenue is forecast to grow 52.3% annually, significantly outpacing the Korean market's 7.2% growth rate, with earnings expected to increase by 65.22%. This high growth trajectory aligns with its substantial insider ownership, reflecting confidence in its prospects. Recent positive developments include a favorable opinion from the European Medicines Agency for EYLUXVI, a biosimilar co-developed with Alteogen Biologics, potentially boosting future revenues if approved as their second commercialized biosimilar product.
• Take a closer look at ALTEOGEN's potential here in our earnings growth report.
• Our expertly prepared valuation report ALTEOGEN implies its share price may be too high. Overview: Hunan Meihu Intelligent Manufacturing Co., Ltd. operates in the intelligent manufacturing sector and has a market cap of CN¥10.02 billion. Operations: Unfortunately, the revenue segments for Hunan Meihu Intelligent Manufacturing Co., Ltd. are not provided in the text you shared. If you have more specific data on their revenue breakdown, I can help summarize that information for you.
summary: The list of companies with high insider ownership can offer appealing prospects due to their potential alignment of management interests with shareholders. ALTEOGEN Inc. is a biotechnology company specializing in the development of long-acting biobetters, proprietary antibody-drug conjugates, and antibody biosimilars, with a market cap of ₩23.09 trillion. The company's revenue is expected to grow 52.3% annually, outpacing the Korean market's 7.2% growth rate, with earnings expected to increase by 65.22%. Recent positive developments include a favorable opinion from the European Medicines Agency for EYLUXVI, a biosimilar developed with Alteogen Biologics, potentially boosting future revenues if approved as their second commercialized biosimilar product. Hunan Meihu Intelligent Manufacturing Co., Ltd. operates in the intelligent manufacturing sector and has a market capital of CN¥10.02 billion.
shortSummary: As global markets face challenges with trade policy and slowing job growth, high insider ownership can offer promising prospects, especially in biotechnology and intelligent manufacturing.

Midstream oil and gas companies, specifically pipeline operators, are well-positioned to benefit from Trump’s executive orders on fossil fuels enacted in early 2025. – – These policies aim to accelerate infrastructure development by streamlining environmental reviews and permitting processes, such as those under the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA). The declaration of a "national energy emergency" further empowers these companies by prioritizing pipeline and storage projects to support increased production from newly accessible federal lands and waters. – – The push to "unleash American energy" also amplifies demand for midstream services as upstream production ramps up, particularly in regions like Alaska and offshore areas reopened for drilling. Pipelines and storage facilities will be critical to moving larger volumes of oil and gas efficiently, especially with the renewed emphasis on LNG exports to meet global demand.

About the Company
| Founded | Employees | CEO | Website |
|---|---|---|---|
| 2008 | 155 | Soon-Jae Park | www.alteogen.com |
ALTEOGEN Inc., a bio company, focuses on developing long-acting biobetters, proprietary antibody-drug conjugates, and antibody biosimilars. The company develops ALT-P1, a long-acting human growth hormone that is in the Phase IIa clinical trial; and ALT-Q2, a long-acting active form of coagulation factor VII for the treatment of hemophilia based on its NexP technology. It is also involved in the development of ALT-P7, a targeted breast/gastric cancer drug that is in the Phase I clinical trial; ALT-Q5, an antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) for the treatment of ovarian cancer based on its NexMab ADC technology; and ALT-LS2, a SC (subcutaneous) formulation of trastuzuamb for the treatment of breast and gastric cancer.

About the Company
| Founded | Employees | CEO | Website |
|---|---|---|---|
| 2001 | 2,541 | Jinsheng Ye | www.cre8direct.net |
Cre8 Direct (NingBo) Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, production, processing, and sale of paper products in North America. The company offers eco-friendly products comprising recycled paper, sugar cane paper, bamboo paper, recycled plastics, and other eco-friendly materials; journals and notebooks; planners and calendars; back to school products, including portfolio pocket folders, pencil cases and pouches, index cards, sticky notes, and expanding files; office and organization products consisting of storage boxes and bags, desk organization products, clipboards, ring binders, document trays, magazine holders, and pen holders; and stationery and gifts, such as notepads, note cubes, thank you notes, boxed notecards, stationery gift sets, and metal pens. It also provides celebration products comprising gift bags and boxes, and greeting cards; seasonal products consisting of Christmas folded boxes and bags, Christmas wraps and cards, and Christmas tableware; creative essential products, including sketchbooks, painting products, and scratch and velvet art products; and kids activities and game products, such as tapes, puzzles, and paper maches, as well as scrapbooking and photo albums, paper crafting products, art supplies, party D.I.Y., dated goods, home décor, and children’s crafts.
